briefTitle: Motion Serifos: A Study to Investigate the Efficacy of Tradipitant in Participants Affected by Motion Sickness
officialTitle: Motion Serifos: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Investigate the Efficacy of Tradipitant in Participants Affected by Motion Sickness During Travel
summary: A multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to investigate the efficacy of tradipitant in participants affected by motion sickness during travel

primaryOutcome.measure: Prevention of Vomiting Measured by Vomiting Assessment (VA)
